welcome_message_body: Welcome to Itoman, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, historical sites, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Itoman has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naha Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Naha Airport handles all domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Naha Airport serves international flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kerama Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kerama Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
